name: pomodoro
description: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break down work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks. [WIKI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique)   - The loop functionality completes one cycle       - 25 > 5 > 25 > 5 > 25 > 5 > 25 > 15 = 2 hours 10 min
author: Alex Li
